channel.title: Apps on Datasketch developers
channel.description: Recent content in Apps on Datasketch developers

item.title: How to develop Datasketch Apps
item.description: Generic Apps Objective Develop many apps at once that share the same funcionalities. Features All apps should have the following funcionalities Same layout {shinypanles} Data Panels Data upload Data preview or tweaking Visualization Panels Inputs, controls and options for users Result previews Data upload from Datasketch Open Data {dsAppsIO, dsconnect} Export modal {using dsAppsIO, dsconnect} Multi-language support using {shi18ny} Custom inputs (search, color palettes, etc) {shinyinvoer} Use data types for humans when possible {homodatum} Use data validations for table inputs {hotr} with dictionaries {datafringe} Use parametrized contents when possible {parmesan} Deployment TODO: How to deploy apps with github actions automatically
